channel.title: Crow Mother on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Crow Mother on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Demons
item.description: Those sleepless nights Too much demons to fight Somebody stop the time Too much people around I'm loosing peace that I found Have to find it again Wake me up Nightmare has gone Wake me up Nightmare has gone I'ts a new day It's a new life But I’ll never know What tomorrow brings I'ts a new day It's a new life But I’ll never know What tomorrow brings I hear a laughter of clouds They’re asking me out Teasing my spirit and my belief I’m ready to follow, to go now Wake me up Let me scream I'ts a new day It's a new life But I’ll never know What tomorrow brings I'ts a new day It's a new life But I’ll never know What tomorrow brings I'ts a new day It's a new life But I’ll never know What tomorrow brings I'ts a new day It's a new life You come and go For a million miles and more Yeah

item.title: Gray Wolf
item.description: He came to fight hunger World slowly walking Keeping eye on you Bite the tail Overkill... take the lead Run them free And you know Show some teeth Playing hard Hunt till dark Wolves live for today Their kill is fast Keeping eyes on a prey we will follow him at last .....gray wolf Silent screams Painful dreams Bloody ground Demon signs Red skies victim's march Keep the light in the eye Let's begin this fight And you know Show some teeth Playing hard Hunt till dark Wolves live for today, Their kill is fast, keeping eyes on a prey, We will follow him at last Wolves live for today, Their kill is fast, keeping eyes on a prey, We will follow him at last .
